{"id":764555288,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1659567227,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"50 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/764555288/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"89.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n        for(int i=0; i<size(nums2); i++){\n            nums1.push_back(nums2[i]);\n        }\n        sort(nums1.begin(), nums1.end());\n        int n = size(nums1);\n        return n%2?nums1[n/2]:((nums1[n/2-1]+nums1[n/2])*1.0)/2;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
